project.name: AndroMDA: The Open Source MDA Tool
project.description: AndroMDA (pronounced: andromeda) is an open source code generation framework that follows the Model Driven Architecture (MDA) paradigm. It takes model(s) from CASE-tool(s) and generates fully deployable applications and other components.

license.name: The AndroMDA Project
license.comments: AndroMDA runs under a BSD license
